title: Pc crash and low priority queue = what the hell
body: So my pc has been acting up, though not all of the low fps is caused by it. Sometimes the client crashes for no apparent reason and i experience low fps and have tried all the ways to fix it. And now after it crashes again i get a low priority queue. Awesome thanks riot

replies.body:
Regardless of the reason the crash occurred, your absence negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. This is actually a big reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we're unable to remove penalties associated with the [**Leaverbuster System**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

If you could give me some more details as to where your client is crashing and any messages you see when the crash happens, I'll be glad to assist in troubleshooting.
